Guys, this works 100%, BUT DO NOT RUN THOSE INSTALLER THINGS THAT ARE INSIDE THE B200 FOLDER THAT ARE IN YOUR FSX AIRCRAFT FOLDER, DO NOT!!!!! if you do, the aircraft will be messed up, I did it to see waht they did, and it got messed up, so I had to uninstall and reinstall, just a warning, DO NOT run those, my guess would be they are anti piracy things
fsxking, those are for RealityXP integration, and should be left alone unless you use RXP. If you ran the "RXP530" exe, simply executing the "CAR530" should fix the issue. It just swaps out the GPS.

Okay, stupid question time...How do you open the readme file? tried changing the extension to an .exe but that just caused an error. It may be that I'm highly intoxicated at the moment also. Any help is appreciated.
to open the readme, just make it a text file by adding .text or .txt to the end
Don't change the readme file extension to .txt as it will corrupt the torrent. Open it and select "choose a program from the list", then select notepad.
